Articles.Content:
Has anyone seen the company called ARCA? They make rockets and drones. It's a really cool aerospace company. They're working on an SSTO rocket. KSP is slowly becoming reality.

Clicky Clicky
If Arca puts a rocket into orbit I'll eat my hat. They're in the business of promises and flashy concepts, not rocketry.

If Arca puts a rocket into orbit I'll eat my hat. They're in the business of promises and flashy concepts, not rocketry.

Better get a gummy bear hat.
They were "ready" to launch their rocket so long ago that I forgot they even existed until you reminded me of them. No updates in six months doesn't fill me with confidence.
